text: The girls' singles section of the 2007 Sony Ericsson Open (also known as the "2007 Miami Masters"), a tennis tournament, was won by the first seed Sorana Cîrstea of Romania. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. # Sorana Cîrstea (Champion) # Naomi Cavaday (Quarterfinals, retired) # Anastasia Pivovarova (Final) # Tamaryn Hendler (Quarterfinals) ==Draw== ===Finals=== ==External links== *Draw Category:2007 Sony Ericsson Open
title: 2007 Sony Ericsson Open – Girls' Singles
